channel.title: tailscale on Phelipe Teles

item.title: Discovering Tailscale
item.description: I have recently started playing with Tailscale, and after a rough start I think I got the hang of it and wanna share how it improved some of my workflows like testing my blog on my Android device or connecting to it with adb without a USB cable.
